patterns_discovered.description: Subtask 2-4 was completed in attempt 1 and repeated in session 6 with no code changes
Commit created with success status but no actual code modifications

gotchas_discovered.description: Task already completed in attempt 1, but session 6 marked as SUCCESS with identical commit message
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Implement task deduplication logic to prevent re-execution of completed subtasks

gotchas_discovered.issue: No actual code changes on success
gotchas_discovered.description: Git diff is empty despite successful task completion status, indicating possible automation or tracking issue
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Validate that code changes are actually persisted before marking tasks as successful

approach_outcome.description: Project Card implementation marked as complete
approach_outcome.notes: Task completion status does not align with git diff output - no files modified despite success indication

recommendations.recommendation: Implement validation checks to ensure code changes exist before marking subtasks as successfully completed
Add safeguards to prevent duplicate execution of already-completed subtasks across multiple sessions
Log actual files modified in each session to maintain accurate project history and prevent redundant work
Implement pre-commit verification to confirm tangible code changes match the completion status
